_header: This name is also an honeycomb that giveth us savour and sweetness
Subjects: Christ, name of; devotional verse; songs
_description: On the name of Jesu — four long monorhyming lines by Friar William Herebert

BLAdd46919.Transcription: þys nome ys also on honikombþat ȝyfeth ous sauour and swetnesseAnd hyt ys a seollich nomeþat maketh ous wondren hys heynesseAnd hyt ys on holsom nomeþat bryngh ous bote of wykkenesseAnd hyt ys a nome of lyfþat bryngþ ous ioie and gladsomnesse
